pos review: Clean, well kept and modern. Rooms are small and with basic furniture but with nice tv set and the bathroom is nice and recently renovated.

they dont have hot water and cup, if u want to drink hot water you have to come to the bar everytime you want to drink tea or something and yeah they dont give you tea in the room. no toothbrush nor shampoo so dont expect something nice except the comfy bed.

pos review: Best value for money around. Staff was really nice to me.
